entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain near noon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of freezing rain beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
